name: AppBehaviourSDK
summary: AppBehaviourSDK is easy to plug framework to analyze behaviour of your users in realtime
description:
AppBehaviourSDK is easy to plug framework to analyze behaviour of your users in realtime.
Just add pod AppBehaviourSDK to your project and you will be able to have all statistics of your app use and even see video of the experience your user have in realtime from your own online dashboard at our system.
